1. Amazon Invests $4 Billion in Anthropic, Deepening Its A.I. Ties  The New York Times
  2. Amazon just threw another $4 billion at startup Anthropic, whose founder defected from OpenAI  Fortune
  3. Anthropic And OpenAI Show Why Musk Should Build A Cloud  The Next Platform
  4. Powering the next generation of AI development with AWS  Anthropic
  5. Amazon and Anthropic deepen strategic collaboration  About Amazon
